law.history: Repealed 1979 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 8, effective July 1, 1979. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, 485; and ch. 17, sec. 42. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 8. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 261, sec. 2. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 37, secs. 2 and 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Tax on criminal convictions paid into state treasury.
